feed.title: Azure Architecture Center
feed.subtitle: Updated articles for Azure Architecture Center

entry.title: Azure App Service and Azure Functions Considerations for Multitenancy
entry.summary: This article describes the features of Azure App Service and Azure Functions that are useful when working with multitenant systems.

entry.title: Architectural Approaches for AI and Machine Learning in Multitenant Solutions
entry.summary: Learn approaches for AI and machine learning multitenancy, including tenant isolation, model training, inference, and how to use Azure AI services.

entry.title: Event-Driven Architecture Style
entry.summary: Explore the benefits, challenges, and best practices for event-driven and IoT architectures on Azure that use messaging patterns and microservices.

entry.title: Architectural Approaches for the Deployment and Configuration of Multitenant Solutions
entry.summary: Learn how to deploy and configure multitenant solutions in Azure by using automation, scalable architecture, and best practices for onboarding tenants.

entry.title: Architectural Approaches for Storage and Data in Multitenant Solutions
entry.summary: Learn about approaches, including common patterns and antipatterns, to support multitenancy for the storage and data components of your solution.

entry.title: Big Data Architecture Style
entry.summary: Learn about big data architectures on Azure with batch processing, real-time analytics, and IoT solutions. Explore benefits and best practices.

entry.title: Build a Conversation Knowledge Mining Solution by using Azure AI Services
entry.summary: Learn how to design a scalable conversation analytics system that extracts insights from conversational data by using Azure AI services and OpenAI.

entry.title: Use Azure API Management in a Multitenant Solution
entry.summary: Learn about Azure API Management features for multitenant solutions, including tenant isolation models, routing, authentication, caching, and rate limiting.

entry.title: Securely Managed Web Applications
entry.summary: Learn how to deploy secure applications by using the App Service Environment, Azure Application Gateway, and Web Application Firewall.

entry.title: Azure API Management Landing Zone Architecture
entry.summary: Learn about a secure enterprise API management architecture that uses Azure Application Gateway, API Management, and CI/CD pipeline deployment.

entry.title: Protect APIs by using Azure Application Gateway and Azure API Management
entry.summary: Learn best practices for networking in Azure multitenant solutions, including hub-and-spoke topologies, virtual networks, and regional deployment strategies.

entry.title: What is a data lake?
entry.summary: Learn about the advantages of using data lake storage repositories, which can hold terabytes and petabytes of data in its native, raw format.

entry.title: Design for Self-Healing
entry.summary: Learn how to design self-healing Azure applications that detect, respond to, and recover from failures to ensure high availability and resilience.

entry.title: Build real-time monitoring and observable systems for media
entry.summary: Learn how to implement real-time monitoring and observability of systems and end-user device telemetry data.

entry.title: Replicate and Sync Mainframe Data to Azure
entry.summary: Learn how to replicate data while you modernize mainframe and midrange systems. Sync on-premises data with Azure data during modernization.

entry.title: Enable real-time sync of MongoDB Atlas data changes to Azure Synapse Analytics
entry.summary: Learn how to keep Azure Synapse Analytics data pools synchronized with operational data changes in MongoDB Atlas.

entry.title: Measure Azure App Sustainability by Using the SCI Score
entry.summary: Create a sustainability model based on available proxies that scores the carbon impact of an application.

entry.title: Greenfield lakehouse on Microsoft Fabric
entry.summary: Learn about a greenfield solution for creating a robust, scalable data platform by using the lakehouse design paradigm on Microsoft Fabric.

entry.title: Modern data warehouses for small and midsize-sized businesses
entry.summary: Learn how to use Microsoft Fabric, Azure SQL Database, Azure SQL Managed Instance, and Data Lake Storage to modernize SMB legacy and on-premises data.

entry.title: Oracle Database with Azure NetApp Files
entry.summary: Implement a high-bandwidth, low-latency solution for Oracle Database workloads. Use Azure NetApp Files for enterprise-scale performance and reduced costs.

entry.title: SQL Server on Azure Virtual Machines with Azure NetApp Files
entry.summary: Implement a high-bandwidth, low-latency solution for SQL Server workloads. Use Azure NetApp Files for enterprise-scale performance and reduced costs.

entry.title: Use Teamcenter PLM with Azure NetApp Files
entry.summary: Learn how to use Azure NetApp Files as a storage solution for Siemens Teamcenter product lifecycle management (PLM).

entry.title: Google Cloud to Azure services comparison
entry.summary: Compare Google Cloud and Microsoft Azure services. Not every Google Cloud service or Azure service is listed, and not every matched service has exact feature parity.

entry.summary: Learn how to design Azure Virtual Desktop for Azure Local to provide a more secure and productive remote desktop experience for users.

entry.title: Rehost mainframe applications to Azure with Raincode compilers
entry.summary: This architecture shows how the Raincode COBOL compiler modernizes mainframe legacy applications.

entry.summary: Learn how Microsoft Entra ID can help secure and protect Amazon Web Services (AWS) identity management and account access. Discover Microsoft security solutions.

entry.summary: Learn how to design scalable automation pipelines where multiple AI agents collaborate by using Semantic Kernel and Azure Container Apps for enterprise-grade tasks.

entry.summary: Learn how to design Azure Local for highly available virtualized and containerized workloads

entry.title: Azure Local storage switchless architecture
entry.summary: Learn how to design Azure Local infrastructure by using a storage switchless architecture.

entry.summary: Recommended architecture for deploying an enterprise application using App Services Environment in multiple availability zones.

entry.summary: This article describes approaches to consider for networking in a multitenant solution.

entry.summary: Learn how to prevent retry storms in cloud applications by using smart retry strategies, circuit breakers, and telemetry insights.

entry.summary: A discussion of how best to configure your environment for Windows Server Update Services (WSUS).

entry.summary: Learn about a scalable, secure AKS microservices architecture that builds on recommended AKS microservices baseline architectures and implementations.

entry.title: Azure Private Link in a Hub-and-Spoke Network
entry.summary: Use Azure Private Link to access PaaS services from a hub-and-spoke network. Connect to these services by using a private IP address from your virtual network.

entry.summary: Learn how to use Azure API Management to implement a JavaScript single-page application that doesn't store tokens in the browser session or local storage.

entry.summary: Learn about options and best practices for spoke-to-spoke communication in Azure Virtual Network designs. Explore hub-and-spoke architectures and routing patterns.

entry.summary: Learn how to organize your Azure resources in a multitenant solution based on tenant isolation and scaling out across multiple resources.

entry.summary: Protect web apps by implementing Zero Trust security in virtual networks. Use Azure Firewall and Azure Application Gateway in networks to maximize protection.

entry.title: Microservices Architecture Style
entry.summary: Learn about microservices on Azure. This architectural style builds applications that are resilient, highly scalable, and independently deployable.

entry.summary: This article describes the considerations that you need to give to domain names when you build multitenant web applications.

entry.summary: This article describes the different stages of a tenant life cycle and considerations for each stage, such as scaling and updates.

entry.title: Build a Document Generation System by Using AI
entry.summary: Learn how to build a simple system to generate documents. It combines retrieval, summarization, and generation to support faster document drafting by using AI.

entry.summary: Learn about fundamental orchestration patterns for AI agent architectures, including sequential, concurrent, group chat, handoff, and magentic patterns.

entry.title: Use Azure Front Door in a Multitenant Solution
entry.summary: Learn about the key features of Azure Front Door that enhance reliability, scalability, and security when working in multitenant solutions.

entry.title: SaaS and Multitenant Solution Architecture
entry.summary: This guide provides an overview of the architectural content for software as a service (SaaS), startups, and multitenancy and guidance about how to architect multitenant solutions on Azure.

entry.title: Architectural Approaches for Identity in Multitenant Solutions
entry.summary: This article covers identity management strategies for multitenant solutions, including authentication, authorization, federation, and security considerations.

entry.title: Architectural Approaches for Compute in Multitenant Solutions
entry.summary: Learn about approaches to support multitenancy for compute components, including scaling strategies, isolation models, and cost-efficient shared resources.

entry.title: Considerations for Using Azure Container Apps in a Multitenant Solution
entry.summary: Learn about Azure Container Apps features that are useful in multitenant systems, including scalability, isolation, and resource management. Get links to extra guidance.

entry.title: Azure Service Bus Considerations for Multitenancy
entry.summary: This article describes the features of Azure Service Bus that are useful in multitenant systems. It provides links to guidance for how to use Service Bus in a multitenant solution.

entry.title: Generative AI Operations for Organizations with MLOps Investments
entry.summary: Extend existing MLOps investments to include generative AI operations. Learn where you can apply existing investments and where you need to extend those investments.

entry.title: Choose an Azure data service
entry.summary: Use this guide to decide which data service best suits your application.

entry.title: Mainframe File Replication and Sync on Azure
entry.summary: Learn about several options for moving, converting, transforming, and storing mainframe and midrange file system data on-premises and in Azure.

entry.title: Build and Deploy Custom Document Processing Models on Azure
entry.summary: Learn more about Azure options for orchestrating, storing, building, deploying, and using custom document processing models.

entry.title: Choose an Analytical Data Store in Azure
entry.summary: Evaluate analytical data store options for big data by reviewing key selection criteria and a capability matrix to compare database models and features.

entry.title: Deploy Microservices with Azure Container Apps and Dapr
entry.summary: Build a serverless microservices solution on Azure Container Apps by using Distributed Application Runtime (Dapr) and Kubernetes event-driven autoscaling (KEDA).

entry.title: Autoscaling Guidance
entry.summary: Review autoscaling guidance. Autoscaling is the process of dynamically allocating resources to match performance requirements.

entry.title: Multitenancy Checklist on Azure
entry.summary: Multitenancy lets you serve multiple tenants in an Azure-hosted solution. Use this checklist to evaluate your multitenancy needs and architecture.

entry.title: Architect Multitenant Solutions on Azure
entry.summary: Learn how to build multitenant solutions, including B2B and B2C SaaS, on Azure by using the guidance that this series provides.

entry.title: Migrate an Oracle Database to OD@A Exadata Database Service
entry.summary: Learn how to use Oracle ZDM and Azure networking to migrate an Oracle database to Oracle Database@Azure Exadata Database Service.

entry.title: Multitenancy and Azure OpenAI
entry.summary: Learn how to deploy Azure OpenAI models and work with the features associated with each model when you have a multitenant system.

entry.title: Multiregion BCDR for Azure Virtual Desktop
entry.summary: Learn which options and scenarios are possible to design and implement an effective multi-region BCDR strategy for Azure Virtual Desktop.

entry.title: Apache Kafka Migration to Azure
entry.summary: Learn about Apache Kafka and about ways to migrate a Kafka implementation to Azure by using Azure services like HDInsight and Event Hubs.

entry.title: Related Resources for Multitenancy
entry.summary: This article provides a set of links and resources for architects and developers of multitenant solutions.

entry.title: Move an IoT Hub-Based Solution from Test to Production
entry.summary: Learn best practices for moving an IoT Hub-based solution to production, including deployment stamps, transient fault handling, and zero-touch provisioning.

entry.title: Multitenancy and Azure SQL Database
entry.summary: This article outlines Azure SQL Database features for designing a multitenant system. It provides guidance and examples for using Azure SQL in a multitenant solution.

entry.title: Automate Document Classification in Azure
entry.summary: Learn how to use the durable functions feature of Azure Functions as an automated document processing pipeline to classify documents by type.

entry.title: Web API Design Best Practices
entry.summary: Learn how to apply best practices for designing RESTful web APIs that support platform independence and loose coupling for service evolution.

entry.title: Azure DNS Private Resolver
entry.summary: Learn how to use Azure DNS Private Resolver to simplify hybrid recursive domain name system (DNS) resolution for on-premises and Azure workloads.

entry.title: Implement Advanced Monitoring for Azure OpenAI Through a Gateway
entry.summary: Learn how to implement advanced monitoring scenarios for Azure OpenAI Service, like chargeback and auditing, via accessing the Azure OpenAI Service through a gateway.

entry.title: Message Encoding Considerations
entry.summary: Review how to choose an encoding format for asynchronous messaging. Explore encoding format considerations and choices for encoding formats.
